text: @NYGovCuomo Hello Gov Cuomo. The problem is THEY DON’T CARE ABOUT HOW MAY AMERICANS DIE. THEY FURGURE ALL IS EXPENDABLE BECAUSE THE VIRUS IS MORE PROMINENT IN MINORITY AREAS. THIS IS WHY THIS ADMINISTRATION IS ALLOWING COVID-19 TO RUN RAMPANT
